Setting.name: languageName
Setting.description: Name of the language shown in NAOqi API

Setting.name: nativeLanguageName
Setting.description: Name of the language shown in its native language

Setting.name: englishLanguageName
Setting.description: Name of the language shown in english

Setting.name: ignoreWhiteSpaces
Setting.description: Set to 1 if the language does not use whitespaces (mostly asian languages)

Setting.name: embeddedCode
Setting.description: Language code for Nuance's Embedded ASR

Setting.name: cloudDevDomainName
Setting.description: IP to access Remote ASR server

Setting.name: cloudDomainName
Setting.description: IP to access Remote ASR server

Setting.name: cloudCode
Setting.description: Language code for Nuance's Embedded ASR
